answers.answer: Could be something in the turkey sausage. Do you have any food allergies?

feeling lightheaded with eating is usually due to low blood sugar so it wouldnt be diabetes. its weird its after eating though. yea maybe try eliminating things from ur diet ie gluten. not sure what it could be really.

question: Hello,I have just began having trouble with light-headedness(not dizziness) after eating.  My firt thought was either high-blood pressure or diabetes.  I went to the doctor's and my blood pressure was normal(120/70).  I then thought diabetes.  I have been trying to pinpoint what I am eating when this happens.  This moring I ate 2 piece of turkey sausage and  about 15 minutes later I had an egg and then the lightheadedness began.  It is now about 45minutes later, still going on.????????This discussion is related to/posts/show/233998.
title: lightheadedness
